TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HeaderedItemsControl extends System.Windows.Controls.ItemsControl

summary.span: 表示包含多个项并且具有标题的控件。

span.span: Represents a control that contains multiple items and has a header.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此类创建一个包含标题 (或标题) 和多个项的控件。Use this class to create a control that contains a heading (or title) and multiple items. 属性可以是任何类型。The property can be any type. [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]附带三个继承自的控件:ships three controls that inherit from : - - - 具有有限的默认样式。A has a limited default style. 若要创建具有自定义外观的, 请创建新的。To create a with a custom appearance, create a new . 设置属性以指定的标签。 Set the property to specify the label of the . 可以是任何类型的对象。 can be any type of object. 将属性设置为, 以自定义标头。 Set the property to a to customize the header. 有关数据模板的详细信息，请参阅[数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information about data templates, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). 此控件的依赖属性可能由控件的默认样式设置。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果按默认样式设置属性, 则当控件出现在应用程序中时, 属性可能会更改为默认值。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 默认样式取决于应用程序运行时使用的桌面主题。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 有关详细信息, 请参阅[默认的 WPF 主题](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个。The following example creates a . 控件包含一个标签 `TreeViewItem 1`为的, 其中包含以下项: The control contains a single , which is labeled `TreeViewItem 1`, and has the following items: - 一个字符串。A string. - 一个 对象。A object. - 一个对象, 该对象在其中包含。A object that contains a in its . - 一个 对象,其属性设置为包含两个对象的。A object whose property is set to a that contains two objects. > [!NOTE] > 该示例显式为最后两个项创建对象, 因为和从类继承。The example explicitly creates objects for the last two items because and inherit from the class. 设置属性的默认样式。The default style for the sets the property. 子对象从显式创建的 (通常是所需的行为) 继承属性值。The child objects inherit the property value from the explicitly created , which is typically the desired behavior. [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#17](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#17)] 下面的示例为创建一个。The following example creates a for a . [!code-xaml[HeaderedItemsControl#HeaderedItemsControl_Style](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedItemsControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headereditemscontrol_style)] [!code-xaml[HeaderedItemsControl#HeaderedItemsControl](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedItemsControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headereditemscontrol)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性为`null`, 则此属性返回`false`。 If the property is `null`, this property returns `false`. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此属性来确定控件是否具有标头。The following example shows how to use this property to determine whether the control has a header. remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于属性的类型为, 因此不会对中放置的内容有任何限制。 Because the property is of type , there are no restrictions on what you can put in the . 由显示,它位于的中。 The is displayed by a , which is in the of the . 有关如何显示的详细信息, 请参阅。For more information about how the displays the , see . ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *headerString**headerString* 要用作标题的字符串。The string to use as a heading. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建和使用标题模板来指定页眉的外观。The following example shows how to create and use a header template to specify the appearance of the header. [!code-xaml[HeaderedItemsControl#HeaderedItemsControl_Style](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedItemsControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headereditemscontrol_style)] [!code-xaml[HeaderedItemsControl#HeaderedItemsControl_Template1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedItemsControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headereditemscontrol_template1)] [!code-xaml[HeaderedItemsControl#HeaderedItemsControl_Template2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedItemsControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headereditemscontrol_template2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置用于显示控件标题的内容的模板。

span.span: Gets or sets the template used to display the contents of the control's header.

value.span: 用于显示控件标题的数据模板。

span.span: A data template used to display a control's header.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要自定义的标题, 请将此属性设置为。To customize the heading of the , set this property to a . 有关数据模板的详细信息, 请参阅[数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information on data templates, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一: `StaticResource`、或。 `DynamicResource`One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *TemplateResourceKey**TemplateResourceKey* 标识所请求的模板的键。The key that identifies the template being requested. 键引用中的现有资源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 属性元素语法在技术上是可行的, 但不建议这样做。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 请参阅[内联样式和模板](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md)。See [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md). 使用或的绑定引用也是可能的, 但情况并不常见。A binding reference using or is also possible, but uncommon. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone| ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何创建和使用标题模板来指定页眉的外观。The following example shows how to create and use a header template to specify the appearance of the header. [!code-xaml[HeaderedItemsControl#HeaderedItemsControl_Style](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedItemsControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headereditemscontrol_style)] [!code-xaml[HeaderedItemsControl#HeaderedItemsControl_Template1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedItemsControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headereditemscontrol_template1)] [!code-xaml[HeaderedItemsControl#HeaderedItemsControl_Template2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/HeaderedItemsControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#headereditemscontrol_template2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象为用来显示每个项的标题的模板提供自定义选择逻辑。

span.span: Gets or sets the object that provides custom selection logic for a template used to display the header of each item.
A data template selector.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常, 当您对同一类型的对象具有多个时, 您需要提供自己的逻辑, 以便基于每个数据对象的属性来选择要应用的。Typically, you create a when you have more than one for the same type of objects and you want to supply your own logic to choose a to apply based on the properties of each data object. 请注意, 如果您具有不同类型的对象, 则可以在上设置属性。Note that if you have objects of different types you can set the property on the . 如果这样做, 则无需创建。If you do that, then there is no need to create a . 此外, 如果您的对象具有相同类型但具有不同的属性, 则还可以考虑使用或数据转换器。Furthermore, if you have objects of the same type but with different properties, you can also consider using a or a data converter. 有关详细信息，请参阅 [数据模板化概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). 若要创建模板选择器, 请创建一个继承自的类, 并重写方法。To create a template selector, create a class that inherits from and override the method. 定义类后, 可以将类的实例分配给元素的模板选择器属性。After your class is defined, you can assign an instance of the class to the template selector property of your element. 如果同时设置了和属性, 则忽略模板选择器属性。If both the and the properties are set, the template selector property is ignored. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 属性元素用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation**MyDataTemplateSelectorImplementation* 一个派生自的类, 它实现实际重写。A class derived from that implements a practical override. 有关如何映射自定义类的信息, 请参阅[WPF xaml 的 XAML 命名空间和命名空间映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 以下项之一: `StaticResource`、或。 `DynamicResource`One of the following: `StaticResource`, or `DynamicResource`. 请参阅[XAML 资源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *DataTemplateSelectorClassKey**DataTemplateSelectorClassKey* 标识所请求的选择器实现的键。The key that identifies the selector implementation being requested. 该键引用实现实际重写的派生类。The key refers to a derived class that implements a practical override. 有关如何映射自定义类的信息, 请参阅[WPF xaml 的 XAML 命名空间和命名空间映射](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md)。For information about how to map your custom class, see [XAML Namespaces and Namespace Mapping for WPF XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-namespaces-and-namespace-mapping-for-wpf-xaml.md). 还可以通过编程方式将类的实例作为资源添加到资源字典。You can also programmatically add an instance of your class as a resource to a resource dictionary. ## 依赖项属性信息Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |标识符字段Identifier field|| |元数据属性设置为`true`Metadata properties set to `true`|NoneNone|

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回一个字符串, 该字符串包含有关标头属性和属性中的项数的信息。This method returns a string that contains information about the header property and the number of items in the property.
